main.name: Barunes Padhy
main.bio: I am a Full Stack Engineer specializing in ReactJS and Python to develop my webpages. I am also highly skilled at algorithms and their implementation for reaching an optimal solution.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

work.title: FullStack Developer
work.description: Responsible for bulding building and deploying a website for an NGO named "Wings of Change". In addition to the website, I was also responsible to setting up an education platform (Kolibri) which will be used for teaching the students at the school.

portfolio.title: PseudoForms: An open-source data colecting platform (Work in Progress)
portfolio.description: Creating an open source data collecting platform which can be deployed on any server easily and used to collect data. This project is aimed mostly for companies/organisations/research professionals who want to hav their own data collecting platform instead of using public services like Google Forms or Survey Monkey. The platform features a unique feature of template form creation unlike any other platform seen before which can aid in much faster form creation

portfolio.title: PseudoPad: An open-source IDE for C++, by C++
portfolio.description: Created an IDE using Qt and C++ which can be used to compile C++ files. It also features multiple tab support, line numbers and syntax highlighting.
portfolio.category: An open-source IDE for C++ by C++

portfolio.title: Sudo-Assemble: Image recognition project
portfolio.description: Integrated a machine learning algorithm into a website which can be used to recognise various computer hardware peripherals. A guide on how I achieved this using Tensorflow GPU has been documented on the github page of the project.
